Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-22868 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.7.5-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-22868 affecting package influxdb for versions less than 2.7.5-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package influxdb is earlier than 2.7.5-2, affected by CVE-2025-22868
